remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的没有现有事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用委托。No existing event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate. 事件数据类型对于此类， ，是用于输入各种更具体的事件数据类的基类。The event data type for this class, , is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input. 定义输入共有而不考虑设备启动事件的事件的事件数据属性。 defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event. 使用委托的一个示例派生的事件数据，并对应于现有输入事件是。An example of a delegate that uses derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is .
